title: I Became the Husband of the Cult Leader of the Demonic Sect
summary:
One of the Six Divine Clans of the Heavenly Demon Sect, the great heir of the Majin Jin Clan, Jin Yeomyeong.
Grateful for being born with a golden spoon in my mouth, I just wanted to enjoy a sweet life...
But damn that Murim Alliance — they destroyed the Heavenly Demon Sect.

And in the final moments of my life, the cult leader Cheon Yura says to me:
“Would you seduce me?”

title: I’m Done Being Your Best Friend
The Lost Cinderella
summary: Midori Yamate is a 15 year-old girl and is very much a tomboy. When she was young, Midori meets a boy called Tsukasa Hino, who came to the island she lives on for a holiday. He teaches her to play soccer and she falls in love with the sport. Midori is inspired by Tsukasa and continues to play soccer in hopes that they would meet again someday. When they do meet again Tsukasa does something unforgivable. Determined to defeat Tsukasa on the soccer field Midori enrolls in an all boy high school

title: The Little Princess Waits for the Breakup
Obssesed butler
summary: No summary available.

title: A Perfect Ending Plan of the Villain in a Fairy Tale
summary:
[There was a pitiful girl who cried tears of diamond and lived while being abused by her family. But a prince appeared and killed off the entirety of the evil family. And so, the girl lived happily ever after with the prince.]

...is the fairy tale, but I reincarnated as the evil sister, 'Marcia Blick'?!

This damned household! I have to escape from this house now, at least! But if I run away, what about my sister who will be left behind? I've made my decision! We're going to run away together!

'Larisa. Let's go find that prince who will make you happy!'

But: "Please marry me."

Prince, why are you proposing to me? Your partner isn't me, but my sister! This sister of yours will make you a 'perfect ending plan'!

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54970327), [Naver Series](http://naver.me/GLuxzytv)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8F%99%ED%99%94-%EC%86%8D-%EC%95%85%EC%97%AD%EC%9D%98-%EC%99%84%EB%B2%BD%ED%95%9C-%EC%97%94%EB%94%A9-%ED%94%8C%EB%9E%9C/2867), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58925157)

title: The Princess’s Double Life
summary: Marie, a domineering and selfish princess, faced her end under the guillotine's blade after her subjects had enough of her. Yet, after dying,  Marie finds herself back a year in the past, discovering that no matter what she does she can never escape the fate that awaits her in a year. Eventually, after Marie learns that the only way to escape her own execution is to conquer a large swathe of 'romantically troubled' women, she decides to use her own 'royal charisma' to build a yuri harem!

title: The Reason Why The Twin Lady Crossdresses
When I Quit Being A Wicked Mother-in-law, Everyone Became Obsessed With Me
summary: I thought my life was over when I woke up in my favorite novel as Anneriché von Balua, the villain executed for mistreating Liliana Everett, her own daughter-in-law! With a husband who's convinced I'm evil and a son who's terrified of me, it seems I'm destined to die this time too. But maybe I can survive by befriending Liliana before she becomes my daughter-in-law to earn some brownie points with this family! The only issue is no matter what I do, everyone is hell-bent on making me the villain!

title: When The Count’s Illegitimate Daughter Gets Married
summary:
As an illegitimate child, Laritte’s biggest sin was being born. In the year she became an adult, she was sent to marry the ghost duke who was rumored to be dead. Her miserable life seemed to get worse and worse, however… Her life changed when the duke came back alive.

“Madam, how do you like it?”
“You have enough luxury to buy some residences in the capital.”
“…no one will be able to look down on you anymore.”

Kind servants and the empire’s devoted and murderous duke. It was already too late for those who tormented Laritte in the past to regret their actions.

title: Please Treat Your Friends Preciously
summary:
I reincarnated as the younger sister of the male lead in a BL novel.
She's a fragile sunfish whose life is in danger even from catching a cold.

So, I took advantage of a childhood friend who has healing abilities.
The problem is, that ability manifests through skinship.
Anyway, it was only a matter of time before this little guy fell in love with the male protagonist, so I didn't worry for long.
We held hands and I stole his first kiss...

But then,
Since when...

"Lavie, you're beautiful."
"Huh...?"
"You should look outside. I couldn't stop myself when I saw you."
"Akka, stop it."
"If you keep getting nervous like that, it makes me wanna do it more."

Why is the guy who should be with the male lead suddenly doing this to me?!

title: Married to my boss
summary:
High school student Hojo Saito married his classmate, Sakuramori Akane, the girl who's his worst enemy in school.

"If you tell the rest of the class we’re married, I'll kill you."
"I don't want them to know either. There’s no point in that."

Their newlywed life wasn't going so well, and they were constantly at odds. However, as they progress through their daily lives, the distance between them closes, they have more enjoyable moments together, and they gradually come to understand one another. Saito learns about Akane's cute side, which he never saw before, and Akane gradually began to recognize the feelings that she’s been keeping inside...

title: Inso’s Law
summary:
"I just want to live a normal life, why is this happening to me!"  
  
Your average student Ham Dan-I, whose hobby was reading internet novels, wakes up and finds a beautiful, novel-like heroine. But even in the world of fantasy novels, her role is no different. Stuck as the childhood friend of the heroine, her normal everday life comes to an end, becoming more twisted by her strong character.  
  


---

title: I Went On Strike Because It Was A Time Limit
summary: As high society's most eligible lady, Sierra Fernein did whatever it took to please her family, despite their flagrant disregard for her. But upon discovering she has only a month left to live, she decides to go on strike from being a prim and proper lady and live life on her own terms. Shedding the Fernein name, she declares war on anyone who dares get in her way, including her family and a few pesky admirers. But with just 30 days left, can Sierra finally enjoy the life of her dreams?

title: How to Reject the King’s Scout
How to Protect My Sub Male Lead Dad
summary: Hanelope knows her dad, Prince Hart von Reinhart, is a good person, it’s just that the world doesn’t know it! The cunning Saint Asta has fooled everyone into thinking the prince is a cruel monster, so Hanelope is determined to put a stop to it once and for all! Hiding her quick wits behind a cute smile, she fights against pesky vassals, malicious rumors, and the manipulative Asta for her dad's happiness. Can Hanelope give her dad a happy ending? Or is this too much for a little girl to handle?

title: The Baby Concubine Wants to Live Quietly
summary:
I possessed a supporting character in a reverse harem novel. A young concubine who, in the end, was driven to death for treason after begging for attention from the regnant empress who was the female lead, and doing wicked things to the male leads who were the concubines. Despite everything, the fortunate thing was that I possessed her right after entering the Imperial Palace. Even if everyone in the Imperial Palace were wary of me, they didn’t hate me yet.

‘Let’s not be impudent, and be obedient.’

I obstinately didn’t need nor have the mindset of trying to be loved by the Empress. Although the male leads who were the concubines were giving me glances, I could just lie flat. Since it wasn’t even a very difficult thing, I really did so. It was definitely like that, but–

“Come to my bedchamber tonight. I’ll read you a fairy tale book!”

“P-please don’t cry. I’ll give you this.”

Just why is everyone’s attitude endlessly gentle? I couldn’t understand. And it was baffling.

‘…I don’t need it though?’

I wasn’t really a young kid lacking affection. And that gaze in which they looked at me as if I were the loveliest in the world was extremely uncomfortable. Just where would I use a fairy tale book that’s full of jewels and silk, and the magic pearl which is the Imperial family’s heirloom? Since it’s already been done, I just wish for everyone to get out of my palace.

---
In the nation of Seora, Yehwa Aryun is the Empress Regnant, and her court is full of consorts with special powers. The newest member of the imperial court is 8-year-old Sanya Yeoran. And although she has no powers, Sanya actually has the mind of an adult who knows exactly what will happen in this fantasy world, because she already read about it in her past life. Thanks to that, she comes up with a plan to avoid her tragic execution: stay away from Yehwa and her jealous consorts at all costs!

title: Since When You Were The Villain?
summary:
She was possessed by a book without knowing what novel it was. Then, one day, her fiance appeared. ‘Killian’ was a perfect Northern Duke with black hair, red eyes, and a handsome face. It was a contract marriage. ‘I can see that person is the male protagonist even if I rolled backwards…’
So, Sophia believed without a doubt. She thought he would be the male protagonist. But…
“Ah, I got caught.”
The smell of blood came on the tip of her nose. Killian’s eyes narrowed. Then she realized the fact that he was a villain.And a cold hand caressed her cheek.
“There won’t be a breakup, Sophie.”
Raising the corners of his lips slightly, he whispered softly. ‘I think this is also a cliché… I hate that cliché!’

title: Shh! I’m Not a Villainess, I’m a Detective!
S-Class Spirit Master’s Taming Diary
summary:
In a world where wars were fought with swords and magic, and the only transportation was by horse-drawn carriage…

There, I lived as a spirit master—and died. But then…

I was reborn?!

In this new life, there were hunters and monsters, just like in my previous one. But here, the concept of spirits didn’t exist at all.

"Jackpot!"

Monsters? Dungeons? That’s the hunters’ problem, right? All I want is the simple, ordinary life I’ve always dreamed of!

But, as they say, misfortune strikes when you least expect it.

In a not-so-coincidental coincidence, I touched a mysterious egg in a dungeon, and at that moment…

"Congratulations! You have awakened, Miss Yuina!"

I had awakened as an S-Class Spirit Master?!

With Iz, the mischievous spirit of water!
Rika, the playful spirit of wind!
And me, Yuina, the S-Class Spirit Master who has lost all hope of an ordinary life!

An S-Class Spirit Master's desperate journey to reclaim her peaceful life!
"Just give me back my normal life!"

title: Oppa, That Must Be A Mistake!
I Helped the Imprisoned Male Lead and He Became an Obsessive Man
summary:
I possessed an errand child who brought meals to the male protagonist who was captured as a test subject at the lab. If the experiment was successful and the male protagonist gained power, the lab would be engulfed in flames. So I tried to run away before that, but I felt bad for the male protagonist who was suffering from the cruel experiment. So I secretly took care of various things while avoiding the researchers' eyes.

"Come to think of it, what's your name?"

"I don't have a name..."

"You make me one."

"Huh?"

I somehow became a little close to the male protagonist.

"Are you going to abandon me? Don't do that."

"Ah... but-"

"Anis, do you mind if I'm wrong?"

"Ugh... No. No, I don't."

"Then stay by my side."

However, the only one who can cure him who is suffering from the side effects of the experiment is the original female protagonist.

I tried to help him and leave secretly so that he could find his partner...

"You promised not to abandon me. But, was it all a lie?”

With the burning laboratory in the background, Emilien smiled with cold eyes.

“A good child should keep his promises.”

The temperature of the hand touching my cheek is cold. The red eyes close as if they are going to engulf me.

“Answer, aren’t you going to tell me?”

...What should I do?

I think I missed my chance to run away.

title: A Thousand Ways For Her to Take Revenge
summary:
' My fiancé who betrayed me, my family who stole everything from me...'

I swore that I would never forgive them even in death. I cursed myself to the point of breaking apart. Did that wish come true? "Lilith, wake up! you have to get ready to leave!" i travelled back in time before my parents passed away!

"Who are you?" "My name is Lilith." I won't repeat my mistakes in this life. Those who trampled on me and belittle me in my past life... I will make them all pay. because now, I'm the one in charge.

title: Tyrant of the Otherworld Prison: My Shadow Can Evolve Infinitely
summary: In the year 2035, rifts to alien realms tore through the world’s defenses. Swarms of insectoids and beastkin ravaged the land, and humanity struggled to survive through the strength of “Evolvers.” Li Yi was betrayed by his teammates during an attack by alien beings and left for dead. On the brink of death, he awakened the “Titan Shadow” System—his shadow could evolve without limits! It could devour ores to enhance defense, tear through enemies to form deadly blades, and even split into an army of shadow soldiers… From insect hives to haunted lands, wherever his shadow passed, enemies were shredded into pulp. This is the revenge of the weak—begun with a shadow that devours all.

title: High class
summary: Haise is a young boy who has been gifted with an unknown ability. He becomes an adventurer together with his childhood friend Sasha, but is kicked out of the team for being unable to use his ability and being a hindrance. Furthermore, while continuing his solo adventure, he is caught in a trap and falls into dire straits. Just as he is on the brink of death, Haise's ability "Weapon Master" awakens! It is a power that shakes the laws of the world, summoning weapons from another world! ? An unrivaled fantasy set in another world that begins with adversity!

title: The Ghostly Doctor
summary:
She, the leader of the hidden sect, specializes in poison and assassination. A genius, and a weirdo, in the eyes of others. After dying from an accident, she was reborn in the body of a disfigured lady. Having her identity changed and unable to return to her family, she abandoned them, but, if she doesn't take revenge on those who caused her harm, will she be worthy of the title "The Ghostly Doctor"? As clouds gather, heroes fight to be the strongest! How will she conquer the world in a red robe, and fight among the strong heroes?!  
  
*The 2 missing chapters are announcements by the author.  


---

title: Keep A Low Profile, Sect Leader
summary:
Traveling to the world of Tian Xuan, can’t believe I’ve become a useless sect’s leader!

Paying money in the city to be reborn in a game’s realm.

Making the players my workers, collecting the main characters from the world as my underlings.

If we’re talking about being pretentious, then I’ll only take the number one spot!

title: The Tyrant’s Family Lasts Thanks To Her Inner Voice
summary: After being struck to death by someone falling from the sky, Jiu Jiu found herself causing a commotion in the King of Hell’s palace. To resolve the chaos, the King of Hell allowed her to enter the world of a book, where she became a princess. However, she was no ordinary princess—she was confined to the cold palace. From the start, due to the heroine’s slander, her tyrant father decided to sentence her to death. Jiu Jiu was left speechless, thinking to herself: “No wonder the Xi Chu kingdom collapses 10 years later. With such an indiscriminate tyrant, the fact that it even lasts 10 years is a miracle.”

title: Marriage with the Archduke, I Know Now
I Raised an Obsessive Servant
summary:
After being reborn as a desolate fire witch and villain destined to die a tragic death, Chersinia creates a plan to avoid her fate by gambling at a casino to become a wealthy recluse. 

The only problem? She somehow ends up with a slave boy named Ben instead of the money she needs! 

But much to her surprise, she starts to warm up to Ben, who provides the perfect joy and comfort in her lonely life. Little does she know that Ben has a dark secret that will change her life forever...

title: Eternal Love
summary: After playing Kokkuri-san, a game which enables this world and the spirit world to communicate, 16 year old Miku is attacked by an evil spirit. Is it just a coincidence that ghosts then, start trying to kill her?…or is it not? Can her classmate, Kanyama Riyou, an exorcist from a Shinto Shrine be able to help save her life?

title: Evil Dragon Is Reincarnated! Revenge Begins at the Age of Five!
summary: I was once the legendary red dragon who stood at the top of the world. For thousands of years, my brethren have been murdered by humans and the desire for revenge slowly turned into my only mission in this world! However, I failed. On the day of the decisive battle against human beings, I died with hatred in my heart... if there is an afterlife, I will definitely avenge my kind. If there is an afterlife, I will make these filthy humans pay with their blood! If there is an afterlife—hmm? I was reincarnated as a weak human baby?!!

title: Romance in the Beast World
summary:
Yuuto is suddenly reincarnated into the other world in a smartphone game and becomes the third son of a noble family. "Skills" exist in that world, and Yuuto was reincarnated with 
"Noblesse oblige." When Yuuto, who has become an adult, embraces a woman as a ceremony, "Noblesse oblige" is activated. That is a rare skill, the skill that lets him copy the skills of the woman he embraces! Yuuto embraces women possessing skills one after another, becoming the strongest with the skills he acquires, and building a harem of women who fall in love with him. Furthermore, it was discovered that "Noblesse oblige" can awaken skills and evolve skills, and the cheating keeps on coming! All the women and skills I want are mine!

title: Things I Didn’t Know Because It Was The First Time
summary: After losing critical memories, and discovering her husband’s betrayal through newspaper headlines, a woman divorces him to start anew as a clockmaker. But when the estranged man returns, insisting "If you hate me coming, then come back instead," their fragile dance begins: Can love rewrite the past when trust is broken?

title: Say the spell, Rose!
summary: A spin-off focusing on Princess Pinya's (from "Gate - Thus the JSDF Fought There!") life before the "Gate" opening to the other world event.

title: Beauty and the Beasts
summary:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?

title: Necromancer’s Evolutionary Traits
summary:
After clearing the game Peccata for the twelfth time, Kim Jinhwan finds himself inside its world as Adrias Cromwell, a weak and cowardly character who always ends up dead!

With six months left until he gets killed along with his master for practicing forbidden magic, Adrias starts training and gathering corpses to better his necromancy, determined to survive. 

But will this long-time gamer's necromancy skills and pre-existing knowledge be enough to change the sequence of events?

title: Defense Breaker
summary:
Jihoon is pulled into a defense game. He’s forced to become the captain of the knights and defend the kingdom from monsters. 

But the wounds he received from people haven’t healed yet, so he refuses to protect the kingdom. 

Then suddenly, a new route opens up…

title: King of Gacha ~God’s Gamer~
summary: Ryuuki has been betrayed by the people he trusted and has fallen to the lowest ranks of society. Hoping for his luck to turn for the better, he spends his days playing at the “Randombox”. His aim is the SSR-rank reward, the right to make an account for the game “Labyrinth”! Sadly, not only did he actually manage to pull his greatest wish, but that too got stolen from him. However, that’s when Ryuuchi’s true luck started! “As long as you can pull it, you will be able to use The System and defy all logic”. Everything stolen from me… But I will take it all back through Gacha!!

title: Wake up, Jeon Seung Yeon
summary:
Seung-yeon is popular because of her pretty face, tall stature, and unique aura, and she works at a cafe, where she gets cheap self-esteem from male customers who show her favor.

Now in her senior year, Seung-yeon knows she should focus on her studies, but she can't quit her job at the cafe easily...
She meets the charming Lee Beom...
___
### Links
* [Alternative Raw](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=11589552)

title: Return of The Genius Swordmaster
summary: When war-orphan-turned-warrior Agrick dies on the battlefield, his last regret is that he never got to fully develop his talents. The next moment, he's reborn... into a family of geniuses! Now, as Dane Sogress, he has to choose to be a spearman like his father, an assassin like his mother, or a summoner or mage like his sisters. But instead of picking, Dane decides to learn it all! Can Dane finally become the master of skills he was meant to be? Or will his take two at life end in failure again?

title: The Top 100 Young Lady
summary:
The servant of the Tendou family, Eito, serves the perfect young lady, Hoshine. 

One day, Eito informs Hoshine that someone from another class confessed their feelings for him. Hoshine, who has hidden her feelings for Eito since childhood, begins to feel uneasy: 

"I’ve loved Eito for a much longer time!"

 As a result, Hoshine starts to approach Eito even more, making bolder advances than ever before! She gets close to him in crowded trains and begs him to sleep by her side… While Eito tries to maintain his role as a formal servant, Hoshine increasingly pursues him with her advances. 

It’s an adorable romantic comedy between a mistress and her servant, featuring a young lady who strives to win her servant’s love!

title: Bitten by the Dog I Abandoned
summary:
Evelyn Winter is the daughter of the House of Winter. She cruelly chases away the dog that only followed her, Gillas Black.

“Didn’t you say you loved me?”
"Love? Did you believe that word? You don’t know your place, you idiot.”
“You will regret this moment.”

Evelyn has no regrets, she marries Rowen, Delilah's heir and has a daughter, Sherry. But their happiness is short-lived when Rowen dies in a train accident and she is left a widow. To make matters worse, his family's financial situation deteriorates. And the boy I used to pet is missing. The dog I abandoned came back as a war hero.

title: Seabird and the Wolf
summary:
A story about a wolf, his encounter with a small puppy, and their life together following.

---

- [Original Manhua <AC.QQ>](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/647560)

- [Original Book <Taobao>](https://item.taobao.com/item.htm?ft=t&id=643452237497)

title: Extroversion of an Immortal
summary:
[Web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2494fq/)  
[Light Novel](https://over-lap.co.jp/Form/Product/ProductDetail.aspx?shop=0&pid=9784865546644&vid=&cat=NVL&swrd=)  
  
—————————————————————————-  
  
From Novel Updates:  
  
The so called 『Enjoy the Human Lives Show Humans Sent to Another World With a Cheat』was trending amongst the Gods. Kanbara Kanata, one of the chosen humans ended up incurring the Evil God’s wrath and as a result, was sent to the worst dungeon,《Cocytus》. But, in a place where he was supposed to lose his life, he met Lunaère, a self-proclaimed misanthropic immortal girl. He was saved by her, who then decided to train him ’till he could at least protect himself.  
  
「Master, I think… I’ve become strong enough.」  
  
「It’s Not enough! Erm, outside of this dungeon is a dangerous place you know!」  
  
「Seriously!? More dangerous than this place…」  
  
This is the story of Kanata who was trained by his master, who easily succumbed to loneliness, till he became the greatest hero of legend, and yet was unaware of it.

title: The Worst Villain
summary: Zechs has a younger sister. Her name is Caron, and he loves her very much. However, if things continue as they are, she will die an untimely death. This world is the same as the RPG romance game he played in his previous life where Caron is destined to die in every route. There was no way Zechs would allow his beloved sister to die so cruelly - that's why he'll resist fate to the bitter end!

title: The Things Melvin Left Behind for Them
summary:
"This is a perfunctory marriage we are carrying out for the sake of protecting you and helping your efforts for revenge."
Cheryl, the beloved lady of Neus Castle.
One night, her uncle rebels, killing her older brother. She, too, was in danger of being killed. Just as she was about to give up in her last moments, someone comes to save her.
"If they want to kill my fiancee, then Neus Castle must be prepared for war."
The Lord of Blaire Castle, Felix, who saves her in the face of a fake engagement. Thus, she begins an unfamiliar married life with the one she had only ever known as her brother's friend.
